article_title: UK's Starmer urges Iran to refrain from Israel attack
sentence: Ismail  Haniyeh  is  not  the  only  senior  member  of  Hamas  to  be  killed  recently.

article_title: UK's Starmer urges Iran to refrain from Israel attack
sentence: Israel  also  recently  announced  that  the  group's  military  chief  Mohammed  Deif  was  killed  in  an  air  strike  in  the  Gaza  Strip  last  month.
